name: Regidrago VSTAR
author: PLANETA Yamashita

attacks.name: Apex Dragon
attacks.effect: Choose an attack from a {N} Pokémon in your discard pile and use it as this attack.

vstar_power.name: Legacy Star
vstar_power.effect: During your turn, you may discard the top 7 cards of your deck. Then, put up to 2 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can’t use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon VSTAR is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
